title: Win a POC helmet and sunglasses package worth over £330
content:
Cyclist
Win a POC helmet and sunglasses package worth over £330

POC has teamed up with Cyclist to give you the chance to win an Omne Air Mips Helmet and Aspire Sunglasses package worth over £330. All you have to do is take part in the survey below and you could be our lucky winner.

POC helmets and eyewear are designed and developed for a seamless fit. They’re built to be perfectly in tune with each other, with a synchronised design, ventilation and aerodynamics.

Discover POC’s selected combinations of eyewear and helmets that are great alone, but better together.

  • Complete the survey to be in with a chance

The legal bit: Open to UK residents only, entries must be received by 23:59 on 23rd July 2023. This competition is being sponsored by POC | Cycling Helmets and Apparel | Snow Helmets and Goggles – POC Sports. Your answers to the survey will be shared with POC, however the email address you provide will only be used to contact you if you win the competition. The winner will be selected at random and notified by email in July. Note we do not sell, rent or share your data with third parties without your consent. Metropolis respects the privacy of every person for whom we have personal data. The group privacy and cookies policy can be viewed here.
